meanings.definition: Puranas: Ancient Hindu texts containing myths, legends, and historical accounts.
meanings.sent1: The library had a collection of puranas that told stories of ancient times.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study puranas to learn about the history and myths of Hindu culture.
meanings.sent3: Reading the puranas felt like traveling back in time to explore ancient tales.
meanings.sent4: The puranas are like time capsules, preserving the rich heritage of Hindu traditions.
meanings.sent5: The vivid illustrations in the puranas brought the ancient stories to life.

meanings.definition: Puranas: A genre of Indian literature.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a section dedicated to puranas, showcasing diverse Indian literary works.
meanings.sent2: Students in the literature class discussed the different styles found in puranas.
meanings.sent3: The puranas genre offered a colorful array of stories that captivated readers.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the puranas was like delving into a treasure trove of Indian literary gems.
meanings.sent5: The richness of the puranas genre reflected the cultural tapestry of India.

meanings.definition: Puranas: Stories of gods and goddesses in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent1: Children enjoyed listening to puranas about the adventures of Hindu deities.
meanings.sent2: The priest narrated the puranas during the religious ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey god in the puranas always brought laughter to the listeners.
meanings.sent4: The puranas painted a celestial portrait of the divine beings in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations in the puranas depicted the gods and goddesses in all their glory.
